ingredients.content: 3 - 4 tbsp alfalfa sprouts, roots removed, plus 1 tbsp extra for garnishing

preparations.content: Place alfalfa sprouts or chives and red radishes into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add cream cheese, salt and pepper and mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Garnish with additional alfalfa sprouts or chives and serve.
